job_offer.question: What kind of job would you like me to do？

website.question: Thank you for your inquiry about a Website. Please contact us.

webapp.question: Thank you for your inquiry about a Web app. Please contact us.

automation_tool.question: Thank you for your inquiry about an automation tool. Please contact us.

other_jobs.question: Feel free to ask any question. Please contact us.

consultant.question: You can watch free nice tutorials on YouTube. You can also build a network with other developers all over the world.

community_activity.question:
LinkedIn is the world's largest professional network on the internet.
You can use LinkedIn to find the right job, connect and strengthen professional relationships
